column4: hey i did  ' sudo dpkg-reconfigure usplash' but it wasnt able to complete. is there some way to replace /boot/initrd.**** with a working one?
i tried  sudo  update-initramfs -u /boot/initrd.img-2.6.17-9-386. but i get an error: /usr/share/initramfs-tools/scripts/functions: line 84: [: /Program: binary operator expected
its the same error that i got from  ' sudo dpkg-reconfigure usplash'
